attributes.action: Make the Costessey Park and Ride travel into the city centre again.
attributes.additional_details:
Recently, they have stopped the park and ride going into the city centre for Costessey. I have spoken to the bus drivers and many have said it is because there was just not the need for it anymore. 

As more and more houses are being built in New Costessey I think it is important that they make the Costessey Park and Ride travel into the city centre to accommodate for us living in the area.
attributes.background: Please sign this petition if you live in Costessey and want the closest P&R to us to travel into the city centre rather than having to travel to with Thickthorn, Harford, etc.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Your local Park and Ride is the responsibility of your council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
